4.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dCharges to the target inflicting damage and
knocking it down.
Generates "10" Combat Advantage.
4.name: Charge
4.title: Charge

6.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack that deals damage.
Consumes *50* Combat Advantage.
6.name: Agonizing_Strike
6.title: Agonizing Strike

7.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack that deals damage.
This ability has its own cooldown duration.
Generates "10" Combat Advantage.
7.name: Lunge
7.title: Lunge

8.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dInflicts damage and knocks the target down.
Can be used only after dodging, blocking or
parrying the enemy's attacks.
8.name: Shield_Slam
8.title: Shield Slam

9.body:
!lvl !cost !dAfter receiving a lethal blow cancels all control
effects, increases your health by \!e1%\ and restores
the same amount of hit points.
Lasts for 16 seconds.
\!e2\ seconds cooldown.
9.name: Die_Hard
9.title: Die Hard

10.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and has a 50% chance to knock the target down.
Inflicted damage depends on the level of equipped boots.
"Generates 10 combat advantage."
10.name: Forceful_Kick
10.title: Forceful Kick

11.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dForces the target to attack you for 10 seconds.
When used on another player, cooldown of this ability increases by 100%, and its duration decreases to 5 seconds.
Each of your two next melee attacks on the same target will increase the duration by 2.5 seconds.
Target of this effect will inflict 50% less damage to everyone but you.
The target must inflict damage equal to !e1% of your total health to be able to switch to another target.
11.name: Intimidate
11.title: Intimidate

12.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack that deals !e1 to !e2 damage to a knocked down target.
" Generates 20 Combat Advantage."
12.name: Arcing_Blow
12.title: Arcing Blow

13.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dA powerful kick that inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage and reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for !e3 seconds.
13.name: Hack
13.title: Hack

14.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage per second during 5 seconds.
* Consumes 40 Combat Advantage.*
14.name: Jagged_Slice
14.title: Jagged Slice

15.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dEnergy regeneration rate increases by 100% for 20 seconds.
15.name: Adrenaline_Buzz
15.title: Adrenaline Buzz

16.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dDecreases your armor by 30%.
Your weapon attacks increase physical damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effectYou cannot use this spell when your shield is equipped
16.name: Aura_of_Ferocity
16.title: Aura of Ferocity

17.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack deals !e1 to !e2 damage to two enemies in front of you.
" Each successful hit generates 10 Combat Advantage."
17.name: Double_Blow
17.title: Double Blow

18.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack inflicting !e1 damage once per second to all enemies in a 7 yard radius.
Movement speed decreases by 50% during cast.
*Consumes 65 Combat Advantage.*
18.name: _Vicious_Spin
18.title: Vicious Spin

19.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dInflicts !e1 to !e2 damage, pushes it back for !e3 yards and knocks off feet.
Damage depends on the quality and level of the equipped helm.
19.name: Headbutt
19.title: Headbutt

20.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack inflicting !e1 to !e2 damage.
"Generates 15 Combat Advantage."
20.name: Flawless_Strike
20.title: Flawless Strike

21.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack deals !e1 to !e2 damage to two enemies in front of you.
" Each successful hit generates 10 Combat Advantage."
21.name: Rapid_Slash
21.title: Rapid Slash

22.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack inflicting !e1 damage per second to all enemies within a 7 yard radius.
Movement speed decreases by 50% during cast.
*Consumes 65 Combat Advantage.*
22.name: Whirlwind
22.title: Whirlwind

23.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack inflicting !e1 to !e2 damage.
*Consumes 50 Combat Advantage.*
23.name: Fatal_Blow
23.title: Fatal Blow

24.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dGrants the Warrior generation of 10 Combat Advantage per second during !e1 seconds.
You will be in a combat mode while the effect is active.
*Consumes 3 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality reduces the cooldown.
24.name: Reasoned_Aggression
24.title: Reasoned Aggression

25.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dWarrior receives 3 stacks of Heroic Might for 20 seconds.
Each use of "Forceful Kick", "Hack", "Devastating Blow" and "Flawless Strike" consumes one stack of the effect.
The abilities deal !e1 additional damage and have extra effects: "Forceful Kick" kicks back target for !e2 yards, "Hack" immobilizes target for 4.
2 seconds, "Devastating Blow" and "Flawless Strike" apply Deep Wound, that deals !e3 additional damage every second during 3 seconds.
*Consumes 3 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality increases additional damage dealt by the Heroic Might effect and duration of the Broken Legs effect.
25.name: Heroic_Might
25.title: Heroic Might

26.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dDelivers 6 blows every half second for 2.5 seconds.
Each blow inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage.
Movement speed reduces by 50% during cast.
* Consumes 70 Combat Advantage.*
26.name: Bloodbath
26.title: Bloodbath

27.body: !lvl !cost !dDamage dealt by paired weapon increases by !e1%, damage spread decreases by !e2%.
27.name: Dueler
27.title: Dueler

28.body: !lvl !cost !dCritical strikes extra damage dealt by paired weapon increases by !e1%.
28.name: Severe_Wounds
28.title: Severe Wounds

29.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dAll Group Members' damage increases by !e1% for 15 seconds, but Willpower decreases to 1.
This is a negative control effect.
Cannot be cast if a shield is equipped.
29.name: Battle_Frenzy
29.title: Battle Frenzy

30.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases a critical strike chance of "Jagged Slice", "Bloodbath", "Agonizing Strike", "Fatal Blow"," Vicious Spin" and "Whirlwind" by !e1%.
30.name: Slaughter
30.title: Slaughter

31.body: !lvl !cost !dDamage dealt by paired weapon increases by !e1%, cooldowns of weapon-based abilities increase by !e2%.
31.name: Long_Swing
31.title: Long Swing

32.body:
!lvl !cost !dFear effects duration reduces by 50%.
The Warrior under Fear effect gains one stack of Anger that increases damage dealt by 5%.
One stack of Anger fades every 5 seconds.
32.name: Sign_of_Weakness
32.title: Sign of Weakness

33.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage to knocked down targets by !e1%.
33.name: Thumbs_Down
33.title: Thumbs Down

34.body: !lvl !cost !dArmor penalty for "Aura of Ferocity" reduces to !e1%.
34.name: Controlled_Rage
34.title: Controlled Rage

37.body: !lvl !cost !dDamage dealt by "Bloodbath", "Crushing Blow", "Bash", "Jagged Slice" and "Arcing Blow" increases by !e1%.
37.name: Butcher
37.title: Butcher

38.body: !lvl !cost !d If "Jagged Slice" effect is active, "Agonizing Strike" will increase its duration by !e1 second.
38.name: Ruthlessness
38.title: Ruthlessness

39.body:
!lvl !cost !dDuration of blinding and disorienting effects applied to the Warrior decreases by 50%.
The Warrior under these effects gains one stack of Anger that increases damage dealt by 5%.
One stack of Anger fades every 5 seconds.
39.name: Blind_Combat
39.title: Blind Combat

40.body: !lvl !cost !dDamage dealt increases by !e1% per each Group Member in the radius of 40 yards.
40.name: Team_Play
40.title: Team Play

42.body: !lvl !cost !dIf paired weapon is equipped, each use of "Bloodbath" ability has !e1% chance for an additional blow.
42.name: Bloody_Massacre
42.title: Bloody Massacre

43.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of "Jagged Slice" ability by !e1 second.
43.name: Rupture
43.title: Rupture

44.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dGrants a Group Member an effect to generate 25% less threat and protects against death.
The Group Member survives after receiving a lethal blow, and transfers all incoming damage to the Warrior for 6 seconds.
44.name: Stalwart_Defense
44.title: Stalwart Defense

47.body:
!lvl !cost !d"Shield Slam" damage increases by !e1%.
Its cooldown decreases by !e2 seconds.
47.name: Handy_Shield
47.title: Handy Shield

48.body:
!lvl !cost !dStony Resilience restores in battle at !e1% of normal speed.
If the barrier is fully destroyed, it restores in battle after !e2 seconds.
48.name: Pebble_Wall
48.title: Pebble Wall

51.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dSingle shot that inflicts 9046 to 27137 damage and reduces target's speed by 50% for 10 seconds.
51.name: Knee_Shot
51.title: Knee Shot

53.body: !lvl !cost !dIf a shield is equipped, the incoming damage may be reduced by 0 with probability !e1%, depending on the quality and level of the shield.
53.name: Hexed
53.title: Hexed

56.body: !lvl !cost !dChance to dodge an enemy attack increases by !e1%.
56.name: Black_Belt
56.title: Black Belt

58.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen incoming damage is blocked, the Warrior receives !e1 energy.
This ability may work only once per 2 seconds.
58.name: Counterattack
58.title: Counterattack

59.body: !lvl !cost !dChance to shield-block magic damage is !e1% of your chance to block physical damage.
59.name: Might_over_Magic
59.title: Might over Magic

60.body:
!lvl !cost !dDuration of control effects applied to the Warrior decreases by 50%, except slowdown, fear, knockdown, stunning, blinding or disorientation effects.
The Warrior under these effects gains one stack of Anger that increases damage dealt by 5%.
One stack of Anger fades every 5 seconds.
60.name: Indomitable
60.title: Indomitable

61.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dJumps to a specified location, inflicting !e1 to !e2 damage to all enemies in a 10 yard radius and toss them up for 1.
5 seconds.
61.name: Crushing_Blow
61.title: Crushing Blow

62.body:
!lvl !cost !dEach attack that successfully deals damage to a single target increases Warrior's movement speed by !e1% for 7 seconds.
This effect stacks up to 3 times.
62.name: Swiftness
62.title: Swiftness

63.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage dealt by "Agonizing Strike", "Fatal Blow"," Vicious Spin" and "Whirlwind" by !e1%.
63.name: Natural_Born_Killer
63.title: Natural Born Killer

64.body:
!lvl !cost !dKnockdowns and stuns duration reduces by 50%.
The Warrior under these effects gains one stack of Anger that increases damage dealt by 5%.
One stack of Anger fades every 5 seconds.
64.name: Stone_Brainpan
64.title: Stone Brainpan

65.body:
!lvl !cost !dDuration of slowdown effects applied to the Warrior decreases by 50%.
The Warrior under these effects gains one stack of Anger that increases damage dealt by 5%.
One stack of Anger fades every 5 seconds.
65.name: Caffeine
65.title: Caffeine

67.body: !lvl !cost !dIf two-handed weapon is equipped, armor increases by !e1%.
67.name: Thick_Plate
67.title: Thick Plate

68.body: !lvl !cost !d"Lunge" ability spends !e1% less energy if two-handed weapon is equipped.
68.name: Feint
68.title: Feint

69.body: !lvl !cost !dDamage dealt by "Devastating Blow", "Flawless Strike", "Double Blow" and "Rapid Slash" increases by !e1%.
69.name: Bull's_Eye
69.title: Bull's Eye

70.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases a critical strike chance of "Lunge", "Charge", "Shield Slam", "Crushing Blow", "Knee Shot", "Hack", "Headbutt" and Inciting Shot by !e1%.
70.name: Musclehead
70.title: Musclehead

71.body: !lvl !cost !dDamage dealt by "Lunge", "Charge", "Shield Slam", "Headbutt" and Inciting Shot increases by !e1%.
71.name: Combat_Training
71.title: Combat Training

72.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !time !cooldown !preparation !dMelee attack inflicting !e1 to !e2 damage knocks off feet and stuns enemy for !e3 seconds.
*Consumes 55 Combat Advantage.*
72.name: Bash
72.title: Bash

73.body:
!lvl !cost !dDamage inflicted by two-handed weapon increases by !e1%.
Melee range increases by !e2 yards.
73.name: Lance_Warrior
73.title: Lance Warrior

74.body: !lvl !cost !dIf two-handed weapon is equipped, Elemental, Natural and Divine resistances increase by !e1%.
74.name: Survival_Code
74.title: Survival Code

75.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases a critical strike chance of "Devastating Blow", "Flawless Strike", "Double Blow" and "Rapid Slash" by !e1%.
75.name: Lucky
75.title: Lucky

77.body: !lvl !cost !d"Hack" and "Knee Shot" reduce enemy's movement speed by !e1% and increase damage by !e2%.
77.name: Warden
77.title: Warden

78.body:
!lvl !cost !d"Charge" knocks down the enemy for !e1 seconds longer.
Chance to knock down increases up to !e2%.
78.name: Streetfighter
78.title: Streetfighter

79.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants you an instant use of Aimed Shot.
79.name: Instant_Shot
79.title: Instant Shot

80.body: !lvl !cost !dWarrior is immune to control spells and effects during "Charge".
80.name: Unstoppable_Force
80.title: Unstoppable Force

81.body: !lvl !cost !d"Crushing Blow" makes !e1 Group Member within a 2 yard radius jump up to the Warrior.
81.name: Low_Flight
81.title: Low Flight
